content: This is a place where we can discuss today's release

Release checklists are up: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4442 and https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4443. @klonos @stpaultim if either of you are around and want to help, lmk.

Backdrop 1.16.2 Release checklist · Issue #4442 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Release scheduled for June 17th, 10am PT Pre-release tasks Merge commits @quicksketch Create the next bugfix milestone @jenlampton Move all unfinished issues to the next bugfix release milestone @j...
Backdrop 1.15.4 Release checklist · Issue #4443 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Release scheduled for June 17th, 10am PT Pre-release tasks Merge commits @quicksketch Draft Release notes @jenlampton Include a short, descriptive summary of the release, for example: Maintenance r...
Drupal releases are not yet out, so I think we're okay on time.
@quicksketch I'm running all the tests locally on the latest PR but am getting some test failures
I think we should make a PR against 1.x and let Zen.CI run them, as it's a lot faster and might avoid any issues with local-specific problems.
@quicksketch I don't think we can do that privately?
I pushed an update to the PR that adds the new function call
Hey :wave: ...I'm around now. Checking the lists to see what I can help with :eyes:
So today is a security release? Just curious if we should be doing this in the Security channel. Or is it not necessary since we already have the patch and it's currently private?
Yeah, it's a security release today. Now that Drupal's release is out it's not a secret. Though we should use the Security channel for discussion of the changes.
And sorry folks, I'll be starting on making the release in about 30 minutes.

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/releases/tag/1.15.4 tag is cut. Working on 1.16.2...

backdrop/backdrop
Backdrop core code repository. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop development by creating an account on GitHub.

SA https://backdropcms.org/security/backdrop-sa-core-2020-004 is published and https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/releases/tag/1.15.4 is released.

backdrop/backdrop
Backdrop core code repository. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop development by creating an account on GitHub.
I was to mark the release as security, but someone beat me to it :+1:
Ha, thanks @klonos! Yeah I was on a roll. Thanks for updating 1.16.2. :D

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/releases/tag/1.16.2 is out and done. Yay! Now just the post-release tasks.

backdrop/backdrop
Backdrop core code repository. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop development by creating an account on GitHub.
Thank you @quicksketch and @jenlampton for doing most of the heavy-lifting ...I'm just helping with the trivialities, trying to save you time.
@quicksketch ++
quicksketch :-) (Karma: 1)
@jenlampton ++
jenlampton go team. (Karma: 7)

@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) When you get a chance, could you push updates to composer and docker? Release check-list is at https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4442

Backdrop 1.16.2 Release checklist · Issue #4442 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Release scheduled for June 17th, 10am PT Pre-release tasks Merge commits @quicksketch Create the next bugfix milestone @jenlampton Move all unfinished issues to the next bugfix release milestone @j...
Huh, someone updated the download block too, which now only requires inputing the version :+1: ...I've updated that as well.
Is there a checklist/PR for Pantheon as well?

Yes @Herb ...see https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4442

Backdrop 1.16.2 Release checklist · Issue #4442 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Release scheduled for June 17th, 10am PT Pre-release tasks Merge commits @quicksketch Create the next bugfix milestone @jenlampton Move all unfinished issues to the next bugfix release milestone @j...
I just pushed the update to Pantheon's upstream. Working on the Tugboat demos.
i should say though i don't do the backdrop-ops/backdrop-docker one any longer
Do we have documentation/procedures on what it takes to do that @Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) ?

@klonos https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/blob/master/procedures/update--docker-image.md

backdrop/backdrop-issues
Issue tracker for Backdrop core. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop-issues development by creating an account on GitHub.
...well shame on me. 've updated those instructions a year ago, and I didn't remember anything about having done so :sweat_smile:
